remarks: The value of set exponentiation. ` ( A ^m B ) ` is the set of all functions that map from ` B ` to ` A ` .  Definition 10.24 of [Kunen] p. 24.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
statement:
mapvalg $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A ^m B ) = { f | f : B --> A } ) $.
$d A f $.
$d B f $.
